labels.shortDescription: The user does not have delete access to the object.
labels.value: You don’t have delete access to this object. Ask your Salesforce admin for help.

labels.shortDescription: The user does not have insert or edit/update access to required fields.
labels.value: You don’t have field-level access to insert/edit this record. Contact your system administrator for help.

labels.shortDescription: The user does not have edit or update access to required fields.
labels.value: You don’t have field-level access to edit this record. Contact your system administrator for help.
